price: (Firauni) akasema: Hakika huyu Mtume wenu aliye tumwa kwenu ni mwendawazimu.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
footnotes: Firauni akwaambia watu wake yale yanayo mtibuwa roho na kumghadhibisha, akautaja Utume wa Musa ni kwao wao, wala si kwake yeye, na akambandikiza wazimu, kwa kuwa ati akiulizwa kitu hujibu kingine, na anamsifu Mola Mlezi kwa sifa za kiajabu ajabu. Na kwa hivyo Firauni anawahimiza wamkadhibishe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
